sql-case.value: ALTER USER user1 WITH ENCRYPTED PASSWORD 'password'
ALTER USER CURRENT_USER WITH ENCRYPTED PASSWORD 'password'
ALTER USER user1 WITH CREATEDB CREATEROLE
ALTER USER user1_bak RENAME TO user1
ALTER USER user1 SET client_min_messages = DEBUG
ALTER USER ALL SET client_min_messages = DEBUG
ALTER USER user1 IN DATABASE ds_0 SET client_min_messages = DEBUG
ALTER USER user1 SET client_min_messages FROM CURRENT
ALTER USER user1 IN DATABASE ds_0 RESET client_min_messages
